name: Resonado, Inc.
description: Developer of audio technology tools intended to reimage the way people experience sound. The company provides proprietary audio technology tools that enable Business-to-Business customers to realize the coexistence of design innovation and superior performance in their audio products, enabling clients to design innovative audio products while maintaining high-fidelity acoustic performance.
one_liner: Developer of audio technology tools intended to reimage the way people experience sound. The company provides proprietary audio technology tools that enable Business-to-Business customers to realize the coexistence of design innovation and superior performance in their audio products, enabling clients to design innovative audio products while maintaining high-fidelity acoustic performance.
